item.title: October Retreats and Conferences
item.description: Even though we are a fully distributed team, we celebrate curiosity, collaboration, and growth together in-person as much as we can. We’ve maintained a tradition of combining tech conferences with team retreats, and this October we had our second 2022 retreat in Chicago, Illinois collocated with GopherCon 2022. We also attended KubeCon 2022 in Detroit at the end of the month.
